member.name: P:AzureEventHubAdapters.AzureEventHubOutputAdapter.EventHubDataClientConnectionString
member.summary: Gets or sets the event hub time-series data client connection string for the Azure event hub connection.

member.summary: Gets or sets the event hub time-series data client name for the Azure event hub connection.

member.summary: Gets or sets the event hub meta-data client connection string for the Azure event hub connection.

member.summary: Gets or sets the event hub meta-data client name for the Azure event hub connection.

member.summary: Gets or sets the Azure event hub partition key for the time-series data.

member.name: P:AzureEventHubAdapters.AzureEventHubOutputAdapter.MetadataPartitionKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the Azure event hub partition key for the time-series meta-data.

member.name: P:AzureEventHubAdapters.AzureEventHubOutputAdapter.DataPostFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the Azure event hub JSON data posting format for the time-series data.

member.name: P:AzureEventHubAdapters.AzureEventHubOutputAdapter.MetadataPostFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the Azure event hub JSON data posting format for the time-series meta-data.

member.name: P:AzureEventHubAdapters.AzureEventHubOutputAdapter.PostSizeLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets the Azure event hub JSON data posting size limit.

member.name: P:AzureEventHubAdapters.AzureEventHubOutputAdapter.TimestampFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the default timestamp format for the time-series data.

member.name: P:AzureEventHubAdapters.AzureEventHubOutputAdapter.SerializeMetadata
member.summary: Gets or sets flag that determines if metadata should be serialized into Azure event hub.

member.name: P:AzureEventHubAdapters.AzureEventHubOutputAdapter.PushMetadataInParallel
member.summary: Gets or sets flag that determines if data and metadata should be pushed in parallel to Azure event hub.

member.name: P:AzureEventHubAdapters.AzureEventHubOutputAdapter.OutputIsForArchive
member.summary: Returns a flag that determines if measurements sent to this are destined for archival.

member.name: P:AzureEventHubAdapters.AzureEventHubOutputAdapter.UseAsyncConnect
member.summary: Gets flag that determines if this uses an asynchronous connection.
